title: Yorick Rework?
body: So I've been recently getting into Yorick and he seems to be the same as he was when he was released in 2011, I remember hearing that he was going to be Reworked sometime in 2016, When though, As much as I love him his VO is heavily limited and his voice gets boring to listen to after hearing the same quote a hundred times in a single game.

replies.body: The next rework is Yorik should be out in maybe a month or two.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202294884

If you look at the Champion Update Schedule, Ryze is the next champion being updated. Originally Yorick was meant to be after the mage update, but its been changed now
I don't want them to change Yorick he's fine how he is :(
the only change is moar ghosts, permanent ghosts
